title: Woman describes Molotov cocktail attack
content: WHEN Sydney woman Deanne Witchard heard a "whooshing" noise and saw an "orange glow" outside her bedroom window, she woke her husband, screaming "the house is on fire". AFTER dragging the family outside in the early hours of March 12, 2013, they realised it was a small blaze in the grass area outside their bedroom window, Ms Witchard told Sydney's District Court on Wednesday.
